mapper.select: select id, name, project_id, close_browser, timout_time, fail_continue, remark, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time from galloping_snail.t_testbusiness_ui where id = #{id}
select id, name, project_id, close_browser, timout_time, fail_continue, remark, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time from galloping_snail.t_testbusiness_ui limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into galloping_snail.t_testbusiness_ui(name, project_id, close_browser, timout_time, fail_continue, remark, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{projectId}, #{closeBrowser}, #{timoutTime}, #{failContinue}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update galloping_snail.t_testbusiness_ui
name = #{name},
project_id = #{projectId},
close_browser = #{closeBrowser},
timout_time = #{timoutTime},
fail_continue = #{failContinue},
remark = #{remark},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_by = #{updateBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
